verses.verse: Hear, <WH8085> Yahweh, <WH3068> my righteous <WH6664> plea; <WH7440> <WH7181> Give ear <WH238> to my prayer, <WH8605> that doesn't <WH3808> go out of deceitful <WH4820> lips. <WH8193>
Let my sentence <WH4941> come forth <WH3318> from your presence. <WH6440> Let your eyes <WH5869> look <WH2372> on equity. <WH4339>

You have proved <WH974> my heart. <WH3820> You have visited <WH6485> me in the night. <WH3915> You have tried <WH6884> me, <WH4672> and found nothing. <WH2161> I have resolved that my mouth <WH6310> shall not disobey. <WH5674>
As for the works <WH6468> of men, <WH120> by the word <WH1697> of your lips, <WH8193> I have kept <WH8104> myself from the ways <WH734> of the violent. <WH6530>
My steps <WH838> have held fast <WH8551> to your paths. <WH4570> My feet <WH6471> have not slipped. <WH4131>
I have called <WH7121> on you, <WH6030> for you will answer me, <WH410> God. Turn <WH5186> your ear <WH241> to me. <WH8085> Hear my speech. <WH565>
Show your marvelous <WH6395> loving kindness, <WH2617> you who save <WH3467> those who take refuge <WH2620> by your right hand <WH3225> from their enemies. <WH6965>
Keep <WH8104> me as the apple <WH380> of your eye. <WH1323> Hide <WH5641> me under the shadow <WH6738> of your wings, <WH3671>
from <WH6440> the wicked <WH7563> who <WH2098> oppress <WH7703> me, <WH5315> my deadly enemies, <WH341> who surround me. <WH5362>
They close <WH5462> up their callous <WH2459> hearts. <WH6310> With their mouth they speak <WH1696> proudly. <WH1348>
They have now surrounded <WH5437> us in our steps. <WH838> They set <WH7896> their eyes <WH5869> to cast us down <WH5186> to the earth. <WH776>
He is like <WH1825> a lion <WH738> that is greedy <WH3700> of his prey, <WH2963> as it were a young lion <WH3715> lurking <WH3427> in secret places. <WH4565>
Arise, <WH6965> Yahweh, <WH3068> confront <WH3068> him. <WH6440> Cast him down. <WH3766> Deliver <WH6403> my soul <WH5315> from the wicked <WH7563> by your sword; <WH2719>

from men <WH4962> by your hand, <WH3027> Yahweh, <WH3068> from men <WH4962> of the world, <WH2465> whose portion <WH2506> is in this life. <WH2416> You fill <WH4390> the belly <WH990> of your cherished <WH6840> ones. <WH1121> Your sons have plenty, <WH7646> and they store <WH3240> up wealth <WH3499> for their children. <WH5768>
As for me, <WH2372> I shall see your face <WH6440> in righteousness. <WH6664> I shall be satisfied, <WH7646> when I awake, <WH6974> with seeing your form. <WH8544>
